module.name: psshipping
module.description: Powered by Mail Boxes Etc, PrestaShop Shipping offers standard, pickup-point and express international delivery methods to your customers no matter where they are located. Have access to exclusive rates for each delivered and returned parcels by using our extensive network of trusted partners.
module.author: PrestaShop
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall PrestaShop Shipping module?
